Endpoints.Description: Endpoint that allows us to get all key data
Endpoints.How to Use: It can be used by sending a get request to the endpoint.

Endpoints.Description: Endpoint that allows us to get all key data
Endpoints.How to Use: It can be used by sending a get request to the endpoint. You must use query param like `?key=foo`

Endpoints.Description: Endpoint that allows us to set new key data
Endpoints.How to Use: It can be used by sending a post request to the endpoint with a json body. Example: `{Key`:`foo`, `Value`:`bar`}`

Endpoints.Description: Endpoint that allows us to delete all data
Endpoints.How to Use: It can be used by sending a get request to the endpoint.
